theRailgunner:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRailgunner:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRailgunner:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRailgunner:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRailgunner:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRailgunner:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRailgunner:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRailgunner:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRailgunner:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRailgunner:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRailgunner:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRailgunner:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theRailgunner:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
